rules_text:
When Behind the Curtain enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until Behind the Curtain leaves the battlefield.
Dash {2}{W} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it’s returned from the battlefield to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Backrooms

Mechanical Uniqueness — Dash on noncreature card
